text: Alibaba and the Thief () is a 2015 Chinese animated children's adventure film directed by Zheng Chengfeng. It was released in China on May 23, 2015. ==Voice cast== *Ye Fang *Ding Yan *Zhang Yang *Wu Rui *Yang Yang *Wang Qi *Sun Ke *Zhang YuanZhong *Wang Xueqin *Wang Yalin *Lu Yao ==Reception== By May 23, 2015, the film had earned at the Chinese box office. ==References== Category:2010s adventure films Category:2015 animated films Category:2015 films Category:Animated adventure films Category:Chinese animated films Category:Chinese children's films Category:Chinese films
title: Alibaba and the Thief
